0.description: Kill another player in a 1v1 match.

2.description: Win a round of a 1v1 match without using any flasks.

3.description: Kill another player in a 1v1 match within %1% seconds of the start of a round.

6.description: Kill another player during a 3v3 match.

8.description: Kill every enemy player in a single round during a 3v3 match.

9.description: Kill another player in a 3v3 match within %1% seconds of the start of a round.

12.description: Kill another player during a CTF match.

14.description: Capture a flag during a CTF match.

15.description: Return a dropped flag during a CTF match.

16.description: Kill another player who is carrying the flag during a CTF match.

19.description: Kill another player in Sarn Arena.

20.description: Survive for %1% seconds in the Sarn Arena without dying.

21.description: Kill %1% other players in the Sarn Arena without dying.

22.description: Kill %1% other players within %2% seconds in the Sarn Arena.
